name: phpmyadmin
description: phpMyAdmin is a self-hosted web-based interface for managing MySQL and MariaDB. It provides access to database structure, queries, and exports through an easy-to-use administrative UI.
features: Database operations: Create, modify, drop, and manage MySQL and MariaDB databases through a web interface.
Table management: Design tables with visual editors for columns, indexes, and foreign key relationships.
SQL query execution: Run SQL queries with syntax highlighting, history, and bookmarking for frequent operations.
Data browsing: View and edit table data in paginated grids with sorting, filtering, and inline editing.
Import and export: Transfer data using SQL, CSV, XML, and other formats with compression support.
User administration: Manage database users, privileges, and access controls with granular permissions.
Server monitoring: View server status, variables, processes, and performance metrics in real-time.
Search functionality: Search across databases, tables, and data with advanced query builders.
Backup and restore: Export database structures and data for backup or migration purposes.
Multi-server support: Manage multiple MySQL/MariaDB servers from a single installation.
Theme customization: Choose from multiple themes to personalize the interface appearance.
Plugin system: Extend functionality with plugins for authentication, export formats, and transformations.
